name: Baking With Drizzle
description:
Wowee a baking sim. 

Help this slimey boy bake the most delicious treats for his master, Honey!

If you do a good job, you might just get some delicious treats of your own...

Artwork by @Saltyschnecke

"Written" by @Saltyschecke

Coded by @iamalovelycooki + @Saltyschnecke

Music from www.bensound.com
